com.chaione.contexthub.sdk

Class ContextHub

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.chaione.contexthub.sdk.ContextHub

  • public class ContextHub
extends Object
    ContextHub manages the initialization of the ContextHub framework.

        appId - The application's ID registered with ContextHub
